description: As of now, the system does not have the feature of deleting the selective uploads.
title: How to delete the images once uploaded to the website?
description_text: As of now, the system does not have the feature of deleting the selective uploads.

description:
The maximum supported file size for uploaded photos are 8 MB for standard account, 15 MB for premium account and 25 MB for a pro account. We recommend you to not exceed the given size limit while uploading photos. 


Supported image formats are JPG, JPEG and PNG.


In regards to dimension, in most styles offered by Picovico, 16:9 landscape ratio photos produce the best result and thus, it's your best choice while uploading images.
title: What is the recommended size, format and dimension for uploaded photos?
description_text:
The maximum supported file size for uploaded photos are 8 MB for standard account, 15 MB for premium account and 25 MB for a pro account. We recommend you to not exceed the given size limit while uploading photos.  
   
 Supported image formats are JPG, JPEG and PNG. 
   
 In regards to dimension, in most styles offered by Picovico, 16:9 landscape ratio photos produce the best result and thus, it's your best choice while uploading images.

description: Currently, our Free Plan allows for up to 20 images, Premium Plan allows for up to 30 images and the Pro Plan allows for up to 60 images to create a video.
title: How many images can I use in my video?
description_text: Currently, our Free Plan allows for up to 20 images, Premium Plan allows for up to 30 images and the Pro Plan allows for up to 60 images to create a video.

description:
Use photos with a standard ratio of 16:9 (HD ratio) in order to avoid any unusual textures in the videos. You can crop your images to this size by double clicking your uploaded image file. 

Eg. 1920px wide, 1080px height
title: What size should the pictures be when uploading so that there are no additional spaces and black borders around the video?
description_text: Use photos with a standard ratio of 16:9 (HD ratio) in order to avoid any unusual textures in the videos. You can crop your images to this size by double clicking your uploaded image file.   Eg. 1920px wide, 1080px height

description: The uploaded pictures may be of poor quality. Try using higher definition images for better results.
title: Why are my pictures looking blur even when I am using a paid account?
description_text: The uploaded pictures may be of poor quality. Try using higher definition images for better results.
